Welcome, I'm Micah Tinife. A professional Front-End Developer working remotely and out of the DMV (District of Columbia, Maryland & Virginia)

Tech Stack

about me

Professional Front-End Developer with 3 years of experience

Front-end developer with proven ability to design and develop JavaScript-based applications for web or mobile environments. Strong knowledge of React JS, Angular, Vue JS, HTML, CSS, and Tailwind. Experienced in all stages of interface component design, from conception to final testing and deployment of web-responsive applications.
